properties.areaDesc: Northern Somerset; Northwest Aroostook; Central Piscataquis; Northern Piscataquis; Northeast Aroostook
properties.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued February 19 at 2:52PM EST until February 20 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Caribou ME
properties.description:
* WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as
30 below zero expected.

* WHERE...Portions of Central Highlands, Far Northern and North
Woods Maine.

* WHEN...From midnight tonight to 10 AM EST Thursday.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The cold wind chills could cause
frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 15 minutes.
properties.instruction:
A Wind Chill Advisory means that cold air and the wind will
combine to create low wind chills. Frostbite and hypothermia can
occur if precautions are not taken. Make sure you wear a hat and
gloves.

NWSheadline: WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 10 AM EST THURSDAY
